DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this study is to illustrate whether there is a difference in the 6 minutes walking test in patients with hip fractures who have received 6 vs. 12 weeks of physical training after discharge from hospital.
DOC.brief_title: Training of Patients With Hip Fracture
DOC.criteria: patients with hip fractures full weightbearing on the affected leg patients living in their own home with an independent walking ability score >=2 according to the New Mobility Score scale written consent institutionalized patients more than 2 weeks after discharge from hospital non weight bearing on the affected leg Dementia other conditions/diagnosis that would have an effect on the ability to train eg. neurological diagnosis
